author: Louise Hay
message: The thoughts we choose to think are the tools we use to paint the canvas of our lives.
title: Thought of the day

author: W. Clement Stone
message: No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more that pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto.
title: Thought of the day

author: Robert McKain
message: The reason most goals are not achieved is that we spend our time doing second things first.
title: Thought of the day

author: John Quincy Adams
message: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
title: Thought of the day
